title: Majority of Mutual Fund Companies at Risk of Lawsuits (Audio)
itunes:title: Majority of Mutual Fund Companies at Risk of Lawsuits (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Jacklyn Wille, a senior legal editor for Bloomberg BNA, discusses why many mutual funds’ longstanding practice of putting their own funds in employees’ 401(k) plans. She speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
